body_html:
Thank you for your answer.I'll fill up it at following:

Have I written custom code:No,I haven't written custom code.
Bazel version:No,i'm not compiling the source code .
GPU model and memory:GeForce GTX 1080 WDDM.Memory is 8192MiB
Exact command to reproduce:My command Step is as following

activate python3.6（a python3.6 enviroment I created on anaconda ）
(python36) C:\Windows\System32>python
Python 3.6.2 |Continuum Analytics, Inc.| (default, Jul 20 2017, 12:30:02) [MSC v.1900 64 bit (AMD64)] on win32
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.

import tensorflow as tf
sess = tf.Session(config=tf.ConfigProto(log_device_placement=True))
2018-09-24 10:51:55.917673: I T:\src\github\tensorflow\tensorflow\core\platform\cpu_feature_guard.cc:141] Your CPU supports instructions that this TensorFlow binary was not compiled to use: AVX2
Device mapping: no known devices.
2018-09-24 10:51:55.926033: I T:\src\github\tensorflow\tensorflow\core\common_runtime\direct_session.cc:288] Device mapping:
(This Step I can't find my GPU)
Mobile device:No,It's not works on mobile device

body:
Thank you for your answer.I'll fill up it at following:
> Have I written custom code:No,I haven't written custom code.
> Bazel version:No,i'm not compiling the source code .
> GPU model and memory:GeForce GTX 1080 WDDM.Memory is 8192MiB 
> Exact command to reproduce:My command  Step is as following
>>activate python3.6（a python3.6 enviroment I created on anaconda  ）
(python36) C:\Windows\System32>python
Python 3.6.2 |Continuum Analytics, Inc.| (default, Jul 20 2017, 12:30:02) [MSC v.1900 64 bit (AMD64)] on win32
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import tensorflow as tf
>>> sess = tf.Session(config=tf.ConfigProto(log_device_placement=True))
2018-09-24 10:51:55.917673: I T:\src\github\tensorflow\tensorflow\core\platform\cpu_feature_guard.cc:141] Your CPU supports instructions that this TensorFlow binary was not compiled to use: AVX2
Device mapping: no known devices.
2018-09-24 10:51:55.926033: I T:\src\github\tensorflow\tensorflow\core\common_runtime\direct_session.cc:288] Device mapping:
(This Step I can't find my GPU)
> Mobile device:No,It's not works on mobile device
